title: imstat
description: Calculation of statistics of one or more images

no_label.title: No Label Flag
no_label.description: Don't write labels on each file's summary line

quiet.title: Quiet Flag
quiet.description: Don't print statistics for each file

pixstat_prefix.title: Pixel-wise Statistics Prefix
pixstat_prefix.description: If more than one image file is given, then 'prefix.mean' and 'prefix.sdev' will be written as the pixel-wise statistics images of the whole collection. These images will be in the 'flim' floating point format. [This option only works on 2D images!]
